pick.pickDescription: Alchemy (Gold-Mana conversion at 1:1 & +1 to hit weapons)
Channeler (No range penalty, spell maintenance reduced to 50%, rounded down)
Archmage (Skill +10, 50% bonus on magic power spent on skill, 2x harder to dispel)
Artificer (½ price item creation, 2 items spells free at start)
Summoner (25% off casting and 25% bonus to researching summoning spells, summoned creature maintenance reduced to 75%, rounded up)
Sage Master (25% bonus to all research)
Runemaster (25% off casting and 25% bonus to research Arcane, 2x effective dispels)
Chaos Mastery (15% off casting and 15% bonus to research Chaos, 2x from Chaos nodes, 2x as hard to dispel Chaos)
Nature Mastery (15% off casting and 15% bonus to research Nature, 2x from Nature nodes, 2x as hard to dispel Nature)
Sorcery Mastery (15% off casting and 15% bonus to research Sorcery, 2x from Sorcery nodes, 2x as hard to dispel Sorcery)
Node Mastery (Immune to dispelling effects, 2x mana from nodes)
Undead (killed by Ghouls/Life Steal or Black Channeled units)

attackResolution.attackResolutionDescription: Attacker has First Strike and Haste, Defender has Haste - Attacker gets first hit in for free; then attacker makes 2nd attack with defender making simultaneous counterattack; then lastly defender makes 2nd counterattack
Attacker has First Strike and Haste - Attacker get first hit in for free; then defender counterattacks simultaneously with attacker's second attack
Attacker has First Strike, Defender has Haste - Attacker gets their hit in, then Defender gets two counterattacks in afterwards
Attacker has First Strike - Attacker hits first, Defender counterattacks afterwards
Attacker and Defender both have Haste - Two sequential melee attacks each with simultaneous counter-attack
Attacker has Haste - First attack is simultaneous with defender's counterattack; then attacker gets another free hit in afterwards
Defender has Haste - Attacker's hit is simultaneous with defender's first counterattack; then defender gets another free counterattack in afterwards
Regular melee attack with simultaneous counter-attack

unitSkill.unitSkillDescription: Attack(s) appropriate for type of hero item

damageType.damageTypeDescription: Standard hits from normal units without magical weapons. Can be blocked by Weapon Immunity.

damageType.damageTypeName: Enchanted melee damage / other unblockable damage
damageType.damageTypeDescription: Defined as anything that bypasses Weapon Immunity but not "magical enough" to be blocked by Magic Immunity, so cannot be blocked by anything. Standard hits from normal units with magical/mithril/adamantium/flame blade/eldritch weapon/etc; and hits from heroes or summoned creatures, undead or chaos channeled units. Rock RATs (too large to be blocked by Weapon or Missile Immunity; not magical enough to be blocked by Magic Immunity); Doom Gaze.
Standard shots from normal units without magical weapons. Can be blocked by Weapon Immunity and Missile Immunity.

Defined as anything that bypasses Weapon Immunity but not "magical enough" to be blocked by Magic Immunity. Still blocked by Missile Immunity. Standard shots from normal units with magical/mithril/adamantium/flame blade/eldritch weapon/etc; and shots from heroes or summoned creatures, undead or chaos channeled units.
Defined as any healable damage that is blocked ONLY by Magic Immunity, e.g. standard magical ranged attacks from units such as Magicians and heroes.
Blocked by Fire Immunity and Magic Immunity.
Blocked by Cold Immunity and Magic Immunity.
Blocked by Death Immunity and Magic Immunity.
Blocked by Stoning Immunity and Magic Immunity.
Defined as any permanent damage that is blocked only by Magic Immunity, e.g. Disintegrate, Banish, Dispel Evil, Holy Word, Word of Death.
Blocked by Death Immunity and Magic Immunity. Stores as its own unique damage type.

weaponGrade.weaponGradeDescription: Magic weapons built with Alchemists' Guild or Alchemy retort

combatAreaEffect.combatAreaEffectDescription: Dispells Non-Chaos with a 50 pt dispel
Chaos Node Aura (+2 to various stats for Chaos creatures)
Dispells Non-Nature with a 50 pt dispel
Nature Node Aura (+2 to various stats for Nature creatures)
Dispells Non-Sorcery with a 50 pt dispel
Sorcery Node Aura (+2 to various stats for Sorcery creatures)

spellRank.spellRankDescription: Very Rare [Special rank for Spell of Mastery to ensure that this is always the last spell to appear in list of available spells to research]

movementRateRule.description: Non-corporeal *prevents* unit from gaining any other benefits, e.g. enchanted road, wind walking
Non-corporeal *prevents* unit from gaining any other benefits, e.g. enchanted road, wind walking
Any flying unit (even flying boats, or boats stacked with wind walkers) can use enchanted road
Any flying unit (even flying boats, or boats stacked with wind walkers) can use enchanted road
Any flying unit (even flying boats, or boats stacked with wind walkers) can use enchanted road
Any flying unit (even flying boats, or boats stacked with wind walkers) can use enchanted road
Any flying unit (even flying boats, or boats stacked with wind walkers) can use enchanted road
Any walking unit (i.e. anything besides boats and non-corporeals) can use enchanted road
Flying units fly above normal road, so all terrain other than enchanted roads costs 1 MP
Flying units fly above normal road, so all terrain other than enchanted roads costs 1 MP
Flying units fly above normal road, so all terrain other than enchanted roads costs 1 MP
Flying units fly above normal road, so all terrain other than enchanted roads costs 1 MP
Flying units fly above normal road, so all terrain other than enchanted roads costs 1 MP
Any ground units can use road
Only ground units get benefit from another unit having path finding (it doesn't let boats move on land!)

Only ground units get benefit from another unit having forester (it doesn't let boats move through forest!)
Only ground units get benefit from another unit having forester (it doesn't let boats move through forest!)

combatTileType.combatTileTypeDescription: Special road tile for city entryway
